title: Robert Smalls Stole A Confederate Ship and Sailed to Freedom, Part Two: From Slavery to Congress
itunes:title: Robert Smalls Stole A Confederate Ship and Sailed to Freedom, Part Two: From Slavery to Congress
description:
In the second part of this series, the guys continue the story of Robert Smalls, from his daring Confederate steamer heist to his later, life-long activism and Congressional career. Listen in to learn more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
